wikipedia_page.main:
Reg Wilson (born 26 January 1948 in Sheffield, England) is a retired professional speedway rider who was team manager of the Sheffield Tigers until 2011.
Wilson spent 18 years riding at the Owlerton club and attained a respectable average of 7.42, scoring a club record 3510.5 points including bonuses in the process. He was the team manager from 1992 until 2007.  In a recent poll of all the Sheffield riders ever he came in the top three. He is a BNP member.

response: *Reg Wilson (born 1948), English speedway team manager and former rider

The Tigers alltime leading point scorer is Sean Wilson with 4246 points and the record appearance maker is Reg Wilson with 470 appearances. Their official track record holder is former captain and No.1 Ricky Ashworth with a time of 59.1 seconds.
